BodRawPoe175.First Lines:
SAint Michael þe aungell clereAnd saint Austyn þe doctour
                    dere…
BodRawPoe175.Last Lines:
…Vn tyll þat comforth crist vs kenThurgh prayer of his
                    moder amen
BodRawPoe175.Attributed Title:
Here begyns an tretyce þat es called þe gast of Gy (f.
                        95v)

TokyoTak32.Last Lines:
…o the frere prech…laceWith the priour
                    forttotalke…

Fragment: 37 lines. Folio is very stained and damaged, with much of the
